title: Kings Will Bow Before Her - Featuring CHIKA
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we’re joined by Grammy Nominated recording artist, CHIKA. We discuss how she got her big break, staying grounded while famous, her presence in the industry and much more. 

Black Business of the Week - Shop EHM http://www.shop-ehm.com

THE FRIEND ZONE IS ON PATREON! Sign up now to catch our 4 spin-off shows (with audio, video and BTS images) and Livestream Tour: www.patreon.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Thank you to our Sponsors:
Cricket Wireless - Join Cricket Wireless this June in celebrating the unshakable spirit of HBCU music programs during Black Music Month. Because HBCU marching bands are showstoppers from the word go. They are a force of nature, and a force for good. They raise the bar and expectations every single time they set foot onto a field. They are not the marching band next door. They are the epitome of poetry in motion. And just like Black Music, they are unstoppable.  Cricket Wireless.  
Storyblocks - Every creator needs a Storyblocks membership. Their ever-growing library consists of 4K/HD footage, After Effects and Premiere Pro templates, music, images, sound effects, and more. Explore their library and subscribe today at https://www.storyblocks.com/friendzone.

National Domestic Workers Alliance -  Sunstorm is a new podcast hosted by Alicia Garza and Ai-jen Poo, two of the leading organizers in America, about how we help each other stay joyful and powerful amidst the chaos of life today. Subscribe to Sunstorm wherever you're listening to this show! 

Ben & Jerry’s - Check out Ben & Jerry’s new Non-Dairy options, as well as the whole Non-Dairy family at https://www.benjerry.com

Stitch Fix - Get started today at https://www.stitchfix.com/FRIENDZONE and you’ll get 25% off when you keep everything in your Fix!  
Ritual - Visit https://ritual.com/FRIENDZONE to start your Ritual today. Ritual is offering my listeners ten percent off during your first three months.

Have a GREAT day!
